column6: Buy from Nexar not from Amazom.
column9: Reviewed in the United States on February 24, 2021
column14: Do not buy this dash cam from Amazon. I repeat do not buy this or any Nexar cam from Amazon. The reason why is because if the cam stops working after the Amazon return window has closed you will be stuck with a cam that does not work. If you try to use the one year warranty through Nexar they will refer you to Amazon because you purchased the cam through Amazon.  You will also not be able to get the warranty through Nexar because you won't have a nexar order number because you didn't buy from Nexar but purchased through Amazon.  Buy from Amazon at your own risk.

column6: Great product, but requires you to have GPS on all the time to work.
column9: Reviewed in the United States on November 4, 2020
column14: I take privacy very seriously. For a camera that requires you to evey time to record tour routes by GPS for it to even work without giving you the option of just recording is just terrible for me. GPS tracking is a great function for extra information, and also can be vital for emergency situations. But it can also represent a privacy uneasiness for  some people. I would like to have the option to not record GPS information, unless a hard-brake event or an accident is detected..

column6: Video from internal camera not saved unless you manually do it during the ride. Yuck.
column9: Reviewed in the United States on December 11, 2019
column14: I'm using this for rideshare, and the internal camera is just a huge pain. In order to obtain video from the internal camera you need to create a clip MANUALLY WHILE YOU ARE DRIVING IN 20-SECOND INCREMENTS while the customer is sitting there. After the ride ends, any non-clipped internal video is immediately dumped and you can't retrieve it. The external video, in comparison, automatically saves to your phone and uploads to the cloud.

column6: If You Have Android, STAY AWAY!
column9: Reviewed in the United States on January 24, 2020
Reviewed in the United States on December 8, 2020
column14: i bought this dashcam with gps thinking that it would give my mph reading during video playback. it does not do this. Also if you want to review video playback on the app you need to have you're location services turned on the whole time during every drive. I drive a lot so with my location services being constantly on along with charging my phone the phone heats up like crazy. so get ready to have a hot phone every time you want to drive somewhere. garbage product and would not recommend to anyone.

column9: Reviewed in the United States on February 13, 2021
column14: I bought this dash camera to replace my Z-Edge. My goal was to have the same quality video but with cloud storage where I could veiw and save footage remotely.

column9: Reviewed in the United States on May 26, 2020
column14: I was really excited about this product.  I even bought two since I've heard so many good things about it.

column9: Reviewed in the United States on August 23, 2019
column14: Ultra easy to install. Easy to setup. And amazing !!!!
